channel.title: Need magic bow spec help

item.title: Need magic bow spec help
item.dc:creator: @FuturePkz FuturePkz
item.description:
@FuturePkz wrote:

Can u help me make this code so it dose the emote twice?

if((IsAttackingNPC) && magespec == true && magespectimer == 0) { startAnimation(426); magespec = true; int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX; int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY; int offsetX = (absX - EnemyX) * -1; int offsetY = (absY - EnemyY) * -1; SpecDamgNPC(playerMaxHit); createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 45, 35, 0 - AttackingOn); magespec = false; arrowattack = 8; TIMERTIMERTIMER = 2; if(TIMERTIMERTIMER == 0 && magespec == false) startAnimation(426); createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 70, 249, 45, 35, 0 - AttackingOn); TIMERTIMERTIMER -= 100; }

Read full topic
